AVY.caption: Default Provider
AVY.doc: Provide a RPC url for the smart contract you are minting from is on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
AVY.name: default_provider

AVc.caption: Token Receiver
AVc.doc: The address of the wallet who can mint these tokens. If you want any address to be able to mint these tokens use: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
AVc.name: token_receiver

AVd.caption: Price
AVd.doc: The price the minter must pay in order to mint these tokens.
AVd.name: price

AVg.caption: Primary Sale Recipient
AVg.doc: The wallet that will receive the funds generated from the initial sale of these tokens.
AVg.name: primary_sale_recipient

AVh.caption: Currency Address
AVh.doc: The currency that the minter will be charged to mint these tokens. For the network native token use:  0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
AVh.name: currency_address

AVi.caption: ERC-20 Contract Address
AVi.doc: The ERC-20 smart contract that these tokens will be minted from. Make sure your signing private key has minting permission on the NFT smart contract.
AVi.name: token_contract_address

AVj.caption: Days Valid
AVj.doc: How many days will this signature be valid for.
AVj.name: days_valid

AVl.caption: Quantity
AVl.doc: The quantity of tokens to be minted.
AVl.name: quantity
